settings.title: 🎉 Show Us Your AWOL Vision Setup and Win Big!
settings.content:
This is your chance to flaunt your amazing viewing experience while also standing the chance to win fantastic prizes. Read on to find out how you can participate, the exciting rewards up for grabs, and the fine print you should know!

Contest Details

Deadline for Submission: Oct 22

Winners Announcement: Oct 28

Rewards:

🏆 Grand Prize: PlayStation 5 - 1 Winner

🎁 Runner-Up Prize: AirPods (3rd generation) - 3 Winners

🎟️ Participation Incentives: 2 AWOL Vision 3D Glasses - 20 Winners

How to Participate:

1. Post a Photo or Video: Show us your AWOL Vision setup!

2. Include a Brief Description: Share how you use your laser projector and what makes your setup unique.

3. Use the Hashtag: Don't forget to use #AWOLVisionSetup and tag us on Facebook (@AWOL Vision) or Instagram (@awolvision).

Event Rules and Guidelines

To keep things fair and transparent, we’ve outlined a few essential rules:

1. Submission Requirements: Entries must include clear, high-quality photos or videos showcasing your AWOL Vision setup. (Highlight the features of AWOL Vision products for a better chance to win!)

2. Originality: All submissions must be original and not previously published or entered into other competitions. No infringement on copyrights, please!

3. Platform-Specific Prizes: Winners will be selected based on their specific platform (Facebook or Instagram). Participants can only win one prize per platform.

4. Winner Notification: Winners will be contacted via official direct message and must provide shipping information within 5 days.

5. Hashtag Requirement: Only entries with the hashtag #AWOLVisionSetup will be considered.

Terms and Conditions

By participating in this contest, you grant AWOL Vision the worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free right to use your content for promotional purposes. Make sure your submissions do not infringe upon any third-party rights.

Join the Fun!

Are you ready to show us your AWOL Vision setup? Don’t miss out on this opportunity to share your creativity and possibly win fabulous prizes. The deadline to submit your entry is October 20, so take out your phones, capture those stunning setups, and share your experiences with us using #AWOLVisionSetup!

Good luck, and may the best setup win! 🎉

👉 Follow us on Facebook and Instagram for the latest updates and tips.
